amendatorysection.para: For purposes of the Health Care Facility Licensure Act, unless the context otherwise requires, the definitions found in sections 71-404 to 71-431 shall apply.

source.note: The Revisor of Statutes has pursuant to section 49-769 correlated LB731, section 93, with LB1034, section 51, to reflect all amendments.
Changes made by LB731 became operative July 19, 2018. Changes made by LB1034 became effective July 19, 2018.
